t: Amazon still the top e-commerce brand in Canada: RBC survey

t: Amazon India demands product listings have country of origin by August 10 | Reuters
s: July 16, 2020 - Amazon.com Inc's India unit has told sellers they must provide country of origin information on product listings by August 10, according to an email sent by the e-commerce giant to sellers, against a backdrop of brewing anti-China sentiment.
